騸字的基本解释

騸
shàn
见“骟”。

騸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shàn］
［《字彙》式戰切］
“骟1”的繁体字。
(1)马被阉割。
(2)指其他动物被阉割。
(3)截去树的主根。

騸字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　騸； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1443第21
【正字通】式戰切，音扇。割去勢也。【臞仙肘後經】騸馬，宦牛，羯羊，閹猪，鐓雞，善狗，淨貓。　又接樹曰騸樹。【月令廣義】有騸樹法。　一作扇。【五代史·郭崇韜傳】謂繼岌曰：當盡去宦官，至於扇馬，亦不可騎。

騸字的源字形

暂无。

geld

geld
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shàn］
["Words" style war cut]
"骟1" in traditional characters.
(1) The horse is castrated.
(2) Refers to other animals being castrated.
(3) Cut off the main root of the tree.
geld
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　骟; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1443 Page 21
【Zhengzitong】style war cut, sound fan. Cut off the momentum also. [Hunxian elbow classic] gelding, ox, goat, steer, upsetting chicken, good dog, clean cat.　 Then he took the tree and called the gelding tree. 【Monthly Order Broad】There is a gel tree method.　A fan. [The History of the Five Dynasties · Guo Chongtao's Biography] It is said that Jiyu said: Go to the eunuch as far as you can, and you cannot ride a fan.
